subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=c|rs=止09}} <!-- The character 歲 is not its kyūjitai form -->

# [[year]]

subSections.title: Readings
Usage notes
subSections.text:
Often abbreviated to much simpler {{m|ja|才}}, for example in {{m|ja|何才||how old?}}, or {{m|ja||１才|1 year old}}, as opposed to {{m|ja|何歳||how old?}}, {{m|ja||１歳|1 year old}}.

{{ja-kanjitab|とし|yomi=k}}

subSections.title: Noun
